title: Frontend Developer
description: Build responsive and accessible web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to improve UI/UX performance.
requirements: Experience with responsive design and accessibility

title: Backend Engineer
description: Design and build scalable APIs with Node.js. Optimize performance, ensure data security, and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
requirements: Familiarity with RESTful APIs and database design
Experience with Docker or cloud services

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create user-centered designs for web and mobile platforms. Work closely with developers to implement modern UI trends.
requirements: Proficiency with Figma or Adobe XD
Strong portfolio of web and mobile projects
Understanding of responsive and accessible design

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Work across the full stack to deliver cloud-native web applications using React and Node.js.
requirements: Experience with RESTful APIs and NoSQL databases

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns to promote client brands and products.
requirements: Knowledge of SEO and Google Analytics
Strong writing and content creation skills

title: Software QA Tester
description: Perform manual and automated testing to ensure software reliability and performance.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets to identify business insights and support decision-making.
requirements: Experience with visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement CI/CD pipelines and manage scalable cloud infrastructure for modern web apps.
